column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I made a list of things that I needed before I left my house .
#text=When I got to the grocery store , I walked in the door and got a shopping cart .
#text=The next thing I did was look at my list to see which items I needed to find .
#text=My list said I needed to get bread , cheese and milk .
#text=First I went to the aisle of bread .
#text=There were at least twenty different kinds of bread .
#text=I picked out my favorite kind of bread , which is whole wheat , and put it in my shopping cart .
#text=Next I went to the dairy section of the store where I put a gallon of milk and a block of cheese into my cart .
#text=I then took my cart up to the front of the store where the cash registers where located .
#text=I put my items on one of the counters and a lady scanned each of them .
#text=She told me how much my groceries cost and I gave her the money to pay for them .
#text=A boy took my groceries from the counter and put them in a bag .
#text=He handed me the bag and thanked me for shopping with them today .
#text=Finally , I left and took my groceries home .
